svg.title: CE-13: Code Evolution Pattern Recognition Analyzer
svg.desc: AI-powered code analysis tool that recognizes patterns, suggests evolution strategies, detects anti-patterns, and provides guided improvement pathways with real-time feedback and learning capabilities for systematic code evolution.
